code: import AlbumShow from"./album_show";import{connect}from'react-redux';import{fetchAlbum as _fetchAlbum,toggleAlbumLike as _toggleAlbumLike}from'../../actions/album_actions';import{playTrack as _playTrack,addTrack as _addTrack,playAllTracks as _playAllTracks}from'../../actions/player_queue_actions';import{fetchUser as _fetchUser}from'../../actions/user_actions';import{addSongToPlaylist as _addSongToPlaylist}from'../../actions/playlist_actions';import{openModal as _openModal,closeModal as _closeModal}from"../../actions/modal_actions";var msp=function msp(state){return{album:state.entities.albums,currentUserId:state.session.user.id,currentUser:state.entities.users[state.session.user.id]};};var mdp=function mdp(){return function(dispatch){return{fetchAlbum:function fetchAlbum(id){return dispatch(_fetchAlbum(id));},playTrack:function playTrack(song){return dispatch(_playTrack(song));},addTrack:function addTrack(song){return dispatch(_addTrack(song));},playAllTracks:function playAllTracks(songs){return dispatch(_playAllTracks(songs));},openModal:function openModal(modal,songId){return dispatch(_openModal(modal,songId));},toggleAlbumLike:function toggleAlbumLike(likeData){return dispatch(_toggleAlbumLike(likeData));},fetchUser:function fetchUser(id){return dispatch(_fetchUser(id));},addSongToPlaylist:function addSongToPlaylist(songId,playlistId){return dispatch(_addSongToPlaylist(songId,playlistId));},closeModal:function closeModal(){return dispatch(_closeModal());}};};};export default connect(msp,mdp)(AlbumShow);
